release.action: AutoCompleteTextField conflict IndicatingAjaxSubmitButton
Backported 2.0 Modal Window
Backported 2.0 Ajax enabled Tree and TreeTable
Fixed markup-id issue of datepicker so it works with ajax
Backported 2.0 wicket-ajax.js compatible version of the autocomplete
mouse selection in the autocomplete
URLEncode AutoComplete request
Added AjaxNavigationToolbar
Added AjaxFallbackDefaultDataTable
Set the AutoComplete response headers properly
Fixed AutoComplete bugs when running under IE
Added wizard component
new ajax driven form upload progress bar (UploadProgressBar)
new ajax link variations with a busy indicator (IndicatingAjaxLink, IndicatingAjaxFallbackLink)
new AjaxEditableLabel
moved Palette form component from wicket-contrib-palette
new ajax enabled TabbedPanel variation with no-ajax fallback functionality
new ajax enabled autocomplete textfield based on capxous.com autoassist
Fixed date picker to work in IE again
new RefreshingView
data providers are no longer stored as a model of the data view, so it is safe to use an anonymous data provider
DataGridView has been factored out of the DataTable implementation
DataTable now supports generic toolbars
Navigation and sortable headers have been factored out into toolbars
new NoRecords toolbar
new Filter toolbar
fixed page indexing bug in AbstractPageableDataView
new Select component that gives user total control of markup. see wicket.extensions.markup.html.form.select package.
Fixed small bug in dataview that caused IDataProvider.size() to be called twice in certain situation on the first request to the page
